pages.text: $(li)The Bookshelf is a decorative placeable block.$(br)$(li)This block can be used to upgrade the enchantment levels in the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/enchanting_table)Enchanting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)There are different versions of them depending on which wood you use.
$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/librarian)Librarians$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:villagers/lumberjack)Lumberjacks$(/l) will trade this block by $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).
